chapters.title: Chapter 28: Trapped
chapters.info: Lord Dulain, p. 479 (339)—Border lord in Murandy who the Tower thought could truly unify Murandy, with a little guidance from the Aes Sedai. He is the reason Siuan and Elaida ordered Gareth Bryne not to use the Queen's Guards to keep raids along Andor's border in check; they did not want one of Bryne's guards to kill him and ruin all of their plans. Unfortunately, Dulain was killed by a farmer before he could unify anything.
